scenes.description: Koseki Bijou (Biboo) explains the rules of the "Heart-stirring line" game to a blindfolded Nerissa Ravencroft.
Nerissa expresses her excitement while the other members of Advent (Fuwawa and Mococo) prepare their personas.
Bijou introduces Bachelor Number 1, "Bill" (played by Mococo), who approaches the microphone.
Bachelor Number 1 (Mococo as Bill) delivers his heart-stirring line, ending with a request to hold hands.
Nerissa reacts to Bill's line as Bijou prepares to step in as Bachelor Number 2, "William."
Bachelor Number 2 (Bijou as William) delivers a more aggressive heart-stirring line, leaning in close to Nerissa.
Nerissa discusses the aggressiveness of the previous line while Fuwawa prepares to act as Bachelor Number 3, "Matilda."
Bachelor Number 3 (Fuwawa as Matilda) delivers her heart-stirring line in a deep, romantic voice.
Nerissa reacts to Matilda's line and Bijou calls upon the final bachelor, "Steve" (played by Shiori).

subtitles.original: ...even on this special date, you feel frustrated that your 'just friends' vibe has not gone away yet.
subtitles.english: ...even on this special date, you feel frustrated that your 'just friends' vibe has not gone away yet.

subtitles.original: Um, now you want Nerissa to see you more than a friend...
subtitles.english: Um, now you want Nerissa to see you more than a friend...

subtitles.original: ...and you want her to think of you as like a more of like a romantic interest.
subtitles.english: ...and you want her to think of you as like a more of like a romantic interest.

subtitles.original: So it's time to make your move!
subtitles.english: So it's time to make your move!

subtitles.original: How are you going to do it? Say something to win her heart!
subtitles.english: How are you going to do it? Say something to win her heart!

subtitles.original: Please do win my heart, Advent!
subtitles.english: Please do win my heart, Advent!
